author: jukka
msg: OAK-1013: Node.addNode(name) different behavior from JR if NodeType resolves to an abstract
We should still catch abstract mixin types, as they are always explicitly specified.

author: jukka
msg: OAK-1013: Node.addNode(name) different behavior from JR if NodeType resolves to an abstract
Allow abstract types to be used in jcr:primaryType and jcr:mixinTypes,
but throw an exception if explicitly passed in addNode(..., type) and
